Welcome to Shaafi hospital: Marxalad wanaagsan oo kusoo dhawaada Shaafi Hospital
A Great Place to receive Care: Mahadnaq qof kasta oo la arko
At Shaafi Hospital, we are committed to: Magaalada Shaafi Hospital, waxaan ugu talogalay inaan bixino adeegyada caafimaadka ee ugu wanaagsan bulshada aan ku noolno. Laakiinna dhammaan dadka soo galootiga ah ayaa waxaan ku dhiirigelinaynaa si loo siiyo caafimaad wanaagsan oo ku salaysan qof kasta oo guriga noogu yimaada.
At Shaafi Hospital, your health and well: Magaalada Shaafi Hospital, caafimaadkaaga iyo nabadgelyadaaduba waxay ka mid tahay dhinaca ugu muhiimsan ee waxa aan ka wadayno. Waxaan halkan ka helnaynaa daryeel caafimaad oo ugu wanaagsan, dib u habeyn caafimaad, iyo taageeradaada si aad ugu gaari lahayd nolol caafimaad leh.
Our hospital is renowned for its commitm: Magaaladana waxay si wanaagsan u taallaa talada horumarka ee caafimaadka. Waxaan leenahay koox ka tirsan dhakhtarka, dhakhtarada, iyo shaqaalaha taageerada oo ka shaqeeya sida ay isugu soo baxaan hababka ugu sarreysa caafimaadka. Ka dib markii loo baahan yahay dib u eegista caadiya oo loo baahan yahay jirro caafimaad oo kala duwan.
We understand that visiting a hospital c: Waxaan fahamnayaa in booqasho magaalada ay tahay shaqsi kasta oo keenaysa caafimaad uu dhibaatada ugu jiro. Sidaas darteed kooxda xilka la wareegtay waa la hirgalin karaa deg-deg ah oo ku baxsan dhamaan dadka loo yaqaano oo loo marayo, loo hagaajiyo, iyo la daryeelaa. Adeegyada caafimaadka ee caafimaadka aan shaqaale ahaan ayaanu ku mahadsan nahay dhinaca ay adeegyada ka haystaan, waxayna ahaan jirtaa dad dhameystiran oo iska leh nabadgelyadaada.
We understand that the right infrastruct: Waxaan fahamnayaa in xal loo baahan yahay ayaa waxa uu ku dhex-jira wajiga muhiimka ah ee lagu talagalayo caafimaadka sare leh. Sidaas darteed waxaan kharashanaysnaa khadka caafimaadka tayo leh iyo teknoloji tayo leh si loo samaynayo xogta saxda ah, daryeelaha fudud iyo hababka loo yaqaano. Adeegyadayada waa ku dhisnaa si ay u sii gasho xaalad caafimaad oo fudud iyo dhagaxdhigga ah ee dadkeena.
Shaafi Hospital offers a comprehensive r: Magaalada Shaafi Hospital waxay bixisaa kooxha xidhiidhada caafimaadka oo dhan si loo helo dhammaan talooyinka caafimaadkaaga. Haddii aad u baahan tahay caafimaad shaqsi, daryeelka tayada, ama dib u hagaysasho caafimaad, kooxha la dhisay kooxha dhaqanka ah waa halkan inay bixiyaan caafimaad is-indho-tir ah iyo caafimaad ku dhisan, waxaan baahinaynaa tababarka bixiyeyaasha iyo habdhaqanka dadka inay lahaadaan xeer iyo falanqayn ku saabsan caafimaadkaaga.
As a community hospital, we actively eng: Sida goobta bulshada ah, waxaan ku kala xiriirnay dhammaan bulshada xadka deggan oo ku qanciyo barnaamijyo caafimaad ee caafimaad, dhaqanka waxbarasho, iyo habdhaqanka caafimaad. Waxaan rumaysanahay inaan baraarujinayno xiriirka dhallinyarada wadaagi kara dhallinyarada iyo inaan ahayn mid ka duwan oo uu ku habboon yahay habka caafimaadka ee ay ku tashanayso.
At Shaafi Hospital, we offer a wide rang: Magaalada Shaafi Hospital waxay bixisaa kooxha kala duwan oo khidmada u furan oo loogu talagalayo in loo helo dhammaan talooyinka caafimaadkaaga. Kooxda xogta sare leh ee caafimaad iyo adeegyada tayada leh waxay ku shaqaysaa inay bixiyaan caafimaad ugu wanaagsan kuwa kala duwan iyo kala-duwan.
Please schedule your appointments online: Fadlan noo diiwaan gasho muuddooyinkaaga online, waxaad booqan kartaa bogga internetka ee webka ee websaytkeena iyo adeegsiga nidaamka garoonka ah ee garsoorka online. Si fiican ugu tilmama shaafihospital.so iyo raadi goobaha dheeraad ee si aad u garsoorto muddadaada ku haboon iyo wakhtigaaga.
Book an appointment through our website: Ballan ka qabso mareegahayaga oo ku raaxayso qiimo dhimis booqashadaada xigta ee cisbitaalka.
This page is still being developed and i: Boggaan waa inuu horumarinayaa oo waxaa laga heli karaa danbe. Mahadsanid saboolnimoadaada!
At Shaafi Hospital, we are proud to be a: Magaalada Shaafi Hospital, waxaan qabanaynaa inaan noqono hay'ad caafimaad oo ugu saraysa oo la dedejinayo inay bulshadooda ka adeegto xaq, wadajir iyo marti gelin. Maaddaama ay taariikh nololeed dhexmaray oo ka yar 7 sano, magaaladeena waa la isticmaalay in la helo qofka caafimaadka ugu wanaagsan ee loo qabo inuu ka shaqeyso caafimaad dheeraad ah iyo inuu abuuro dadka inay ku noolaadaan nolol caafimaad leh iyo nolol wanaagsan.
Our mission is to provide comprehensive,: Dhawrsashadeena waa inaan bixino adeegyada caafimaad ee sare loo qabo oo xidhiidhka bulshada oo markhaati xagga abuurista, waxbarashada iyo qaybinta bulshada. Waxaan isku daynaynaa inaan noqono halka ugu sare ee horumarka caafimaadka, si loo hubiyo in dadkayaga ay helanayaan caafimaad ugu sareeya oo loo helo dhammaan daryeelka iyo daawashooyinka ugu horreeya ee laga helo.
Excellence is at the heart of everything: Nabadgelyada waa kuwa dhawrka ku jirta meel kasta ee aanu sameyno. Waxaan si joogto ah ula dhaqanno shaqaalaha caafimaadka, tiknoolajiyadda, iyo goobaha si loo hubiyo inaanu u soo dhammaanno qaabeynta ugu sare ee bixinta caafimaadka. Xarunta ciilka leh ee dhakhtarka sare leh, ganacsatooyinka, tiknikiyaanada, iyo shaqaalaha taageerada waxay ka mid yihiin kuwa ku xiran tayada caafimaad ee ka qayb qaadanaya inay bixiyaan daryeel gaar ah oo ku gaadhsiiya tahay dhameystirka talooyinka gaarka ah ee kasta oo qofka.
Always here for You: Mar kale halkan kugu noqon karnaa
Name: Magaca
Discover Our Journey of Care and Compass: Galis riyadaaga ee maalgelinta iyo hal-abuurka
Welcome to our Hospital's Story Page, wh: Ku soo dhawow bogga sheekada Xarunta Caafimaadkeena, halkan waxaan kugu diirinaynaa inaad ku noolaadaan hadalka qalbiga ah ee soo baxay oo shaqaynaysa hay'addayaga oo loogu talagalay inay noqoto isfahan oo caafimaad iyo hal-abuur ku shaqeeyo.
Our journey began with a simple yet prof: Riyada aan u dareemnay waxay bilaabeysay isfahan qoto dheer la qabto bulshadayada. Waxa la bilaabay sidii klinik bilaash ah oo yar oo la keeno in ka badan marka loo eego xarunta caafimaadka hadda tiraaha. Dhammaan gaari lagu qabto, dhammaan hal-abuurna laga helay, waa shahaadooyin ku saabsan isaga walaalkayga loo talagalay in uu ilaaladaado noloshaaga.
Over the years, we've embraced innovatio: Sanado keliya ayaa noo socon waayey horumarka, la taageero shirkadaha, oo hawl galay dib-u-dhiska caafimaadka. Warbixinkeena ee guulka wuxuu dhisay aragti ka baxsan macallimiinta caafimaadka loo dhiirrigelinayo oo qalabkooda soo socda oo ay u istaagi karaan in ay bixiyaan caafimaadka ugu sareeya. Ka horumarka tiknoolajiyadda geedka ilaalinta illaaliyada shaqada, waxaan ku faraxsanahay inaan ku siino ugu fiican ee ay caafimaadka casriga ah ugu talo gasho.
Our story is interwoven with the rich ta: Sheekadayagu waa ku qoran farta weyn ee bulshadayada. Waxaan rumaysan nahay in caafimaadka wax ku dhici karo dariiqada xarunta caafimaadkeena - waxay tahay inay u badato bulshooyinka, oo ay iska saaraan isbedelka, waxayna ka qaybqaadanayaan barnaamijyo dib-u-eegis, oo ay wadatashiyeed waxyeelada caafimaadka, iyo shaqaalaad taageero ah si loo hubiyo in bulshada oo dhan ay noqoto mid caafimaad leh iyo mid fiican.
As we reflect on our past, we're excited: Marka aan ka soo jeedo taariikhdaaga, waxaan ku faraxsan nahay mustaqbalka. Sheekadayaga wuxuu sii socdaa, maadaama aanu ka mid ahayn ku dhiirigelinaya in aan la taabto dhulka, samaynno daryeelno jadwalka cusub, oo ku saabsan taajirka caafimaadka. Maadaama aanay bulshadayagu waqti ka jirin, waxaan diyaarinaynaa in aan soo baxno qaybtii soo socda ee riyadaaga - midka ku jira warbixin, iyo dhigista, iyo horumarka aan kusoo dhicin. Mahadsanid inaad tahay qayb ka mid ah sheekadayadaaga. Waxaan rajaynaynaa inaan la wadaagno qaybaha dheeraadka ah ee caafimaadka, hal-abuurka, iyo rajadaada adag.
Leading the Way in Medical Excellence an: Sugida jidadka ee Ugu horreeya ee dhallinyarada iyo Daryeelka Ugu Horreeya.
Monthly digest of what's new and excitin: Xayeysiis bilood ah ee wax cusub iyo kuwa xanbaarsan ee nagu soo kororto.
Xarunta Shaafi. Dhammaan hawsha la saaro.
